original: @188b * // mdze la sogs pa sa bdag gi nad gso ba ni /
analyzed: @188b * // mdze la sogs pa sa bdag gi nad gso ba ni /
translated: Curing one’s own illness of leprosy, etc.

original: dang po lha'i rnal 'byor rdzogs par byas la /
analyzed: dang po lha'i rnal 'byor rdzogs par byas la /
translated: First, one should complete the deity yoga.

original: bsgrub byas 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo'i spyan sngar sems bskyed pa dang / skyabs su 'gro ba bya ste /
analyzed: bsgrub byas 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo'i spyan sngar sems bskyed pa dang / skyabs su 'gro ba bya ste /
translated: The one to be benefited should generate the mind of awakening and go for refuge in front of Noble Sitātapatrā.

original: gzungs bris nas gdugs sam rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te /
analyzed: gzungs bris nas gdugs sam rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te /
translated: Having written the dhāraṇī, one should attach it to the top of an umbrella or a victory banner.

original: mchod bstod bya zhing mdun du gdugs dkar mo can phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis bskor bar bsams te /
analyzed: mchod bstod bya zhing mdun du gdugs dkar mo can phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis bskor bar bsams te /
translated: One should make offerings and praises, and imagine that in front of oneself is a host of Sitātapatrā’s seals.🔽One should always bathe and recite the dhāraṇī, and at the end of the session, one should offer a bali to Brahmā and so on and make requests, and one should offer a bali to the one who is causing harm and make requests.

original: rtag tu khrus bya zhing bzlas brjod bya ba dang / thun mtshams su tshangs pa la sogs pa la gtor ma byin la gsol ba gdab pa dang / gnod par byed pa la yang gtor ma byin te gsol ba gdab par bya ba dang / gdugs dkar mo'i srung ba gdags shing tha mar thams cad 'joms pas bskrad cing gzir ba dang /
analyzed: rtag tu khrus bya zhing bzlas brjod bya ba dang / thun mtshams su tshangs pa la sogs pa la gtor ma byin la gsol ba gdab pa dang / gnod par byed pa la yang gtor ma byin te gsol ba gdab par bya ba dang / gdugs dkar mo'i srung ba gdags shing tha mar thams cad 'joms pas bskrad cing gzir ba dang /
translated: One should apply the Sitātapatrā protection, and at the end, one should expel and suppress with the all-conquering.

original: kun sngar bshad pa bzhin bya'o //
analyzed: kun sngar bshad pa bzhin bya'o //
translated: All should be done as explained above.

original: de lta bu'i gang zag la ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi nang tshun chad du 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / rims dang / shu ba dang / g-yan pa dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / mdze dang /
analyzed: de lta bu'i gang zag la ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi nang tshun chad du 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / rims dang / shu ba dang / g-yan pa dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / mdze dang /
translated: For such a person, within twelve yojanas, all bhūtas, vetālas, ḍākinīs, fevers, pustules, scabs, small pox, leprosy,🔽boils, and abscesses will be pacified.

original: phol mig dang / g-yan pa la sogs pa gzhung gi phan yon de yang sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs so //
analyzed: phol mig dang / g-yan pa la sogs pa gzhung gi phan yon de yang sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs so //
translated: This benefit of the text does not include the ripening of past karma.

original: rkyen las gyur pa thams cad la /
analyzed: rkyen las gyur pa thams cad la /
translated: For all that is due to conditions,

original: phan yon ji ltar bshad pa bzhin 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phan yon ji ltar bshad pa bzhin 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the benefits will arise just as explained.

original: nad gdug pa can gso ba'i thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: nad gdug pa can gso ba'i thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The method of curing virulent diseases is complete.
